entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:29 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow before morning. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
